author: akv
msg: Updated the APIs from the JSP 1.1 PR2 spec. Since I copied them over to the
directories where my jakarta-tomcat module was, I ended up using the old
copyright headers. I'll change them in a subsequent checkin to use the ASF
header. I also want to fix some JavaDoc stuff here and propagate it back

author: akv
msg: Updated this example to be compliant with the JSP 1.1 PR2 spec. This example
is a bit old; before the TagSupport and BodyTagSupport classes were introduced.
I'm going to clean this up later to use those classes.

author: akv
msg: Added an item on cleaning up messages.properties.

author: costin
msg: Bug fix in cookies - send V0 cookies in addition to v1. That solves
a problem with J2EE login in Apache mode.
( the problem exists only when using Apache as a Web Server)
